name: ZeroBounce
description: Email Validation Service. Use ZeroBounce's email validation API to increase your email marketing ROI! Remove invalid email addresses from your list using our unique email verification scrubbing system to prevent email bounces.

api_methods.name: Activity Data
api_methods.description: Our Activity Data feature allows you to gather insights into your subscribers’ overall email engagement. The tool returns data regarding opens, clicks, forwards and unsubscribes that have taken place in the past 30, 90, 180 or 365 days. Thus, you can improve your targeting and personalization, and run more successful email campaigns.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API Key, found in your account.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address you want to check activity for

parameters.name: ip_address
parameters.description: The IP Address of where the Email signed up from - You can pass in blank

api_methods.name: Validate Email with IP (v1)
api_methods.description: Email Validation Endpoint with IP for Geolocation

parameters.name: ipaddress
parameters.description: The IP Address the email signed up from (Can be blank, but parameter required)

parameters.description: The email address you want to validate
